scenario_text.value:
Waaaaaaaah!
You guys SUCK!
Ah... He ran off.
Oh yeah? Well fine by me.

Thanks you two. We were able to get back all
the stuff he took with you here.
Pay it no mind, my boy.

He got his just desserts for messing with
Miu’s stuff!

Oh, there you are, Syakomon! And Takuma’s
here, too?
Miu! Look, I got your stolen talisman back!

Huh? My talisman? Stolen? What’re you talking
about?

Syakomon helped take back all the stuff that
was stolen.
Really! Well thanks, Syakomon!
Don’t mention it!

And you too, Takuma! You must’ve helped,
right?
Heheh, I knew you were a decent guy!
Yo, guys! What went down here?!

Hmph, you were a bit tardy, my boy. Here,
I retrieved your important item.
Huh? Retrieved my... Oh, this’s my sock!

Falcomon recovered all of the stuff that got
stolen.
That right? Thanks a million, Falcomon!

Ho ho, I do hope you treat it with greater
care going forward?

Thanks to you too, Takuma! You saved me from
an itchy-footed future!
My toesies owe you big time!
Takuma! Are you all right?
Aoi, Labramon.
I smelled a battle, so we came running!
Oh, that’s all done with. It’s cool.
Really? That’s good to hear.
Here, Aoi.
Oh... This is my ring!
Looks like it was stolen, so I took it back.

Thank you, Takuma... I can’t tell you how
grateful I am.
It’s nice to know I can count on you.
Wh-what’s going on?! What’s happening?!
Oh, Shuuji, Lopmon.
We’ve been attacked...? Do I have to fight?
Don’t worry, it’s all over already.
Thank goodness...
Oh, Shuuji, this is for you.
This is...my wallet!
Looks like it was stolen, so I took it back.

I, I see... Yes, I knew I couldn’t have just
lost it somewhere!
Oh, ahem, uh... Thank you, Takuma.
Whoa! What happened?!
Saki, Floramon. It’s you two.

Saki saw you running into the woods, Takuma.
She freaked out and chased right after you.

Oh yeah? But it’s okay. There was a little
fight but it’s over already.
Oh, okay... Jeez, don’t scare me like that.

By the way, Saki. Do you happen to be missing
a handkerchief?

Huh? How’d you know? I just noticed I’d lost
it a little while ago.

This was mixed in with all of the other
stolen items.
Oh, my hanky! You got it back for me, Takuma?

With a little help from Agumon and the
others, yeah.
Thanks! I was real torn up about it!
Wow, you sure are dependable, huh?
Hey, you good?! What went down?!
Kaito! Dracmon!

I sensed a battle brewin’. I figgered we
could throw a few punches ourselves.
Sorry, but it’s already over.
Word? Ah well, as long as everyone’s safe.
Oh, that reminds me. Here, Kaito.
This is...the canned food I was looking for!
Looks like it was stolen, so I took it back.

Is that right... Damn, dirty thief. I’ll show
him a thing or two next time I see him.

But uh, anyway... You did me a real solid.
So...thanks.
Wha’, what happened?! We get attacked?!
Kewww?!
Oh, hey Ryo, Kunemon.
It’s fine. The battle’s already done with.
Is, is that right... Well, works for me.
Not only that... Here, this is yours, right?
Oh! The bus pass holder I got from my mother!

Looked like it was stolen, so I stole it
right back.

Oh... So that’s what happened. Man, I...
*sniff* I’m so relieved...
Kewy, keww!

Oh, yeah you’re right... Thanks a lot,
Takuma. You really got no idea.

Whew... I’m glad we managed to get back
everyone’s stuff.
Thanks for helping out, Agumon.
Yeah! You did a good job too, Takuma!

I’m glad we got everyone’s important stuff
back!
